title: Clustering-Based Web Resource Search Strategies for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Enhancing the ability to search for mathematics resources aligned with educational objectives in a flexible learning environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently classify math education web resources using clustering-based search tools.
Learners can structure search results according to educational criteria (difficulty, type, application field).
Learners can measure and improve the effectiveness of search strategies through formative assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
